Zurich Home Insurance Plan
HomeChoice Insurance Plan
A customised plan which allows policyholders to adjust the maximum amount of protection and add extra benefits Up to HK$1,250,000
Splendor Deluxe Property and Home Insurance Plan
Cover deluxe household contents including jewellery, home décor and personal liability Up to HK$3,000,000
Zurich Householder Insurance VS Landlord Insurance
Householder Insurance
Householder insurance is designed especially for householders, tenants and self-occupied landlords. This plan is characterized by its coverage for home contents from stamps, coins, medals collection to wine. The maximum annual coverage is HK$1,250,000. Also, alternative accommodation and meal allowance are available if the insured premise is made uninhabitable by an insured cause.
Landlord Insurance
Landlord insurance is designed especially for leasing property. The major highlight of this plan is the protection against loss of rent. If the leasing property is made uninhabitable by an insured accident or when the tenant fails to pay the rent, the landlord can receive HK$20,000 per month for a maximum of 6 months.
Zurich HomeChoice Insurance Plan Features
Up to HK$1,250,000 Home Contents Protection
Cover home contents, personal belongings, valuables, wine for an unlimited number of times within the maximum annual coverage. The maximum protection is HK$1,250,000.
Up to HK$ 10,000,000 Legal Liability Protection
Cover worldwide personal liability and liability as an occupier, a pets owner and a tenant and legal liability as a homeowner and home owner’s liability in the common area. The maximum protection is HK$10,000,000.
2 Different Solutions
Zurich HomeChoice Insurance Plan offers different plans namely householder insurance and landlord insurance. The former one is for householders, tenants and self-occupied landlords while the latter is for leasing property.
Customised Home Insurance Plan
Adjust the protection amount and add additional benefits such as building, worldwide personal possession and personal fine art collection cover according to needs.
Worldwide Protection
Cover loss of money and illegal use of credit cards worldwide. Cover repair cost for mobile phones, tablets and laptops.
24-Hour Emergency Home Assistance Services
Provide 24-hour emergency home assistance services for free referral services including plumbing, electrical or locksmith assistance.
Zurich Splendor Deluxe Property and Home Insurance Plan Features
Comprehensive Insurance Protection
Provide comprehensive insurance protection for wine, mobile phones and other portable electronic devices, personal belongings, jewellery, home decor and personal liability
Valuable Property Protection
Provide up to HK$50,000 valuable property protection for each item/set with a total sum insured HK$500,000 at home and HK$300,000 worldwide per incident
Special coverage
Provide special protection for lifestyle elements such as covering green living, pets, missed events, etc.
How to file claims for Zurich Home Insurance?
Step 1
Submit claims online through "Zurich HK" App/ "eClaim" online claim platform/ email with supporting documents e.g. original receipt
Step 2
Receive an acknowledgement SMS and/ or email from Zurich in 2 working days after submission of the claim
Step 3
The claims assessment will then be carried out when all required documents are received
Zurich Home Insurance FAQ
What are the common exclusions?
Zurich Home Insurance Plan excludes loss that cannot be explained, illegal building works, electrical and mechanical breakdown, wear and tear.
Should I buy Home Insurance even if I am only a tenant?
Yes. You will get protection for the household contents including your personal belongings and legal liability.
What items are classified as valuable property under Zurich Splendor Deluxe Property and Home Insurance Plan?
Jewellery and watches
Gold, silver or other precious metals
Curios and works of art
Fine wine
Furs, and personal possessions e.g. designer handbags
Photographic and portable telecommunications electronic equipment, e.g. mobile phones, portable/ notebook computers, etc.
Can village houses or properties in aged buildings be insured?
Yes, village houses or properties in aged buildings will be insured and they can get an instant quotation online but the premium may vary depending on circumstances.
